text: Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni,`tenchi o tsukutta no wa dare ka.' To toeba, kare-ra wa kanarazu `arra.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga i. `Sorenara anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Arra no soto ni anata gata no inoru mono-tachi wa, moshi arra ga watashi ni taishi saiyaku o o nozomi no toki, kare no saiyaku o nozoku koto ga dekiru no ka. Mata watashi ni taishi jihi o o nozomi no toki, kare no jihi o kyohi suru koto ga dekiru ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, arra ga ireba banzendearu.
